concept.title: Extended Tutorial
concept.shortdesc: The extended tutorial builds on the basic tutorial, using an additional set of stages to flatten delimited data, perform some minor data transformations, and write to Elasticsearch.

conbody.p: If you don't use Elasticsearch, you can use data preview to see how the pipeline transforms data before we add the destination.

The extended tutorial continues with the following steps:
Use a Jython Evaluator to flatten data.
Configure a Field Converter to convert field types.
Manipulate data with the Expression Evaluator.
Use data preview to review and edit the pipeline.
Optionally connect an Elasticsearch destination and start the pipeline.
